Body:
rec = [''] * len(FIELDS)
rec[FIELDS['foo']] = 'foo'
rec[FIELDS['bar']] = 'bar'
rec[FIELDS['gor']] = 'gor'
rec[FIELDS['org']] = 'org'
rec[FIELDS['horn']] = 'horn'
rec[FIELDS['mook']] = 'mook'
rec[FIELDS['hostname']] = 'hostname'
for key in kwargs:
    rec[FIELDS[key]] = str(kwargs[key])
return ','.join(rec) + '\n'
